price: 10.Sheetoona Malaykak sissikuk qawta qangara akke waytek yaabbeenim maduudan, tokkel ura dabiitay ken cararisa ken kataata.
arabic: إِلَّا مَنۡ خَطِفَ ٱلۡخَطۡفَةَ فَأَتۡبَعَهُۥ شِهَابٞ ثَاقِبٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: illā man khaṭifa al-khaṭfata fa-atbaʿahu shihābun thāqibun
